creator: hppyhjh@163.com
text:
position: HTTP Request - Parameters - Add from Clipboard
enhancement:
i.e, I have a following line in clipboard
signType=1
then, I click 'Add from Clipboard', what Jmeter populate the data is:
fill 'signType=1' in Name field, fill nothing in Value field.
I suppose it should populate 'signType' in Name field and fill '1' in Value field.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 53957 ***
creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
